QAData.question: Who won between Crystal Palace and Chelsea on Sat, 01 Oct 2022 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Chelsea won 2–1 over Crystal Palace on Sat, 01 Oct 2022 14:00:00 GMT.
